message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at that price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I understand your position, but $14,000 is really my bottom line. Could you possibly meet me halfway at $12,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe that $10,000 is a fair price for the product. Would you be open to discussing other terms or conditions that might allow us to reach an agreement at that price?
